Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students communicating with each other over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone works using elements of sound, like sound waves, to explain the communication.
The student can include specific features of the string telephone, such as cups and a tight string, to show how it sends or receives information.
The student can represent the role of technology in helping people communicate over long distances in their drawing.
The student can depict how using the string telephone helps people connect and communicate in different locations.
